REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM V f2541 reute b f BC-/U.S.-TO-SELL-13.2-BI 06-02 0066

TEXT.TITLE: U.S. TO SELL 13.2 BILLION DLRS OF BILLS
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. Treasury said it will sell 13.2 billion dlrs of three and six-month bills at its regular auction next week. The June 8 sale, to be evenly divided between the three and six month issues, would result in a paydown of 1.3 billion dlrs as maturing bills total 14.512 billion dlrs. The bills are to be issued June 11. Reuter
